sentences.sContent: Roderick Lewis did three odd things yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 罗德里克刘易斯昨天做了三件怪事。

sentences.sContent: We were joined by Roderick Hawkins, director of communications for the Chicago Urban League.
sentences.sCn: 和我们一起去的还有芝加哥城市联盟的总监罗德里克霍金斯。

sentences.sContent: Roderick Lewis, 23, reportedly approached Officer Scott Bloom in West Haven and yelled, "I need a bag of dust."
sentences.sCn: 据报道，这位名为罗德里克 路易斯的23岁男子在西天堂接近警官斯科特布鲁姆、并大喊“我要一包粉！”
